script: Sailin' the seas be the life for me
I be causin' a roarin' ruckus with ye!
ARRR! how be ye this fine day?##
It be swell to see ye all here
I can't believe this be our last party!
Arr! There be some stinky cheese around...
Thank ye for being the best shipmates...
a captain could ever ask for
I wish ye the best on your adventures
May ye never run out of loot!##
The fastest ship on the seas!
It be faster than a slippery squid
It be faster than a greased cannonball
It be faster than Rookie chasing a sandwich
And let me tell ye mateys, he be pretty fast!
This be the barrel where I keep me stinky cheese
And this also be a barrel of stinky cheese
And this barrel... stinky cheese too
Perhaps I have too much stinky cheese
That be a joke, HAR HAR HAR!
You can never have too much stinky cheese
No, there's no crow up here
It just be a strange name
Ahhh, that one gets me every time##
##There be a memory dear to me heart
It be the time I meet me best friend...
I was sailin' me ship for new lands
All kinds of adventures I be havin'
Avast! In the sea there be a strange sight
It be a piece of driftwood with a puffle atop it
And sped to save that puffle's life
Ay, he warmed to me like a clam to a shell
and now he be me first mate!
It be the Coins for Change parties
Ye be a fine and generous crew
and ye donate ya hard earned coins
T'is a fine thing ye be doing
Arrrr... ye think this be a tear in me eye?
Nay, just a bit of sea salt, mateys!
It be the time ye helped rebuild the Migrator
A lily-livered ice berg crashed into me ship!
The migrator sunk to the bottom of the bay, it did!
But ye really came through for me, mateys
Ye worked hard to salvage her from the depths
and finally the Migrator was rebuilt!
Of course those pesky crabs sunk it later
But ye helped me with those scallywags too!##
Mateys! how about a pirate parade?
Up the ladder to the Crow's Nest!
Last one to the Beach be a wet fish!
and a bottle o cream soda!
##AVAST this be the place for pirates!
Who be servin' the food in this place?
HAR HAR HAR I be jokin'
Play a sea shanty me matey!
ARR ye be a fine piano player!
Here be my favoritest sea song
WE BE A CREW OF PIRATES
WE DRINK BARRELS OF CREAM SODA
AND EAT TONS OF STINKY CHEESE
BUT THE THING THAT WE LIKE BEST
I be in the mood for squid pizza
What else ye want on it, mateys?
Do ye like these toppings, mateys?
Arr...these pizzas not be sittin' well
That be the best pizza I ever had!
I got a case o' the pizza toots
Now that's what I be callin' FAIR winds
It be these fish yar har har!
Arr she be a fine ship!
Me ship be full o' treasure for everyone!
It be the pirate's life for me
I be the CAPTAIN of me ship!##
##Find me key to open me quarters!
Me journal be in the Newsroom
Ye hard work on me ship be noted! Thank ye!
Aye me key be hidden on this island!
Have ye found the key to me quarters?
What ye all think of me Captain's Quarters?
I see ye be liking me Treasure Hunt##
Watch where ye be aimin those snowballs!
We be settlin this score the old fashioned way...
YE BE RUEIN THE DAY YE MESSED WITH ME
This be the greatest snowball fight ever fought
ARR, I be playin hide and seek!
Hide n' Seek be a good game for pirates
It be makin' ye could at findin things
This be a good place for a story
Who be tellin this tale? Ye or me?
I swear on me beard this be true!
Can ye guess what happened next?
Ye won't believe what happened next
That be the end o' me tale!
Yarr harr! Ye be a fine bunch o' listeners!!
when a strange creature came upon me
and he smelled of the sea
his teeth were as BIG as a whale
AND HE BE LOOKIN' MIGHTY HUNGRY
I feared he was to eat me
can you guess what happened next?
It be a tangled mess o' seaweed
And in it YARR be hidin'
So me treasure be safe after all!
burying me treasure on a strange new island
a group of treasure huntin' flamingos came me way
I not be sharin' with the likes of them
ye never know when they be tellin' the truth
they promised loads of cream soda
just as I be drinkin' me cream soda
they made off with me treasure
left me with nothin' but me friend YARR
Good thing I had some coins hiddin' in me beard!
Tryin' to follow me treasure map
When I be seein' a tiny pirate parade
They be marchin' across the sand
And even be havin' stinky cheese
It be ants with little eye patches!
When I followed 'em to their anthill
I saw where they be gettin' the cheese!
It be comin' from me own Migrator!
So I parlayed with their queen
And they helped be find treasure!
But I had to leave them me cheese
And I be sailin' the seas
When I saw black sails off me port bow
It be lookin' like a pirate battle!
But I be hollerin' to the cap'n
We both be pirates lookin' fer loot!
So the cap'n and I find an accord
That be meanin' we make a deal
So we both be gettin' new treasure!##
Bet ye didn't know I could sew, did ye?
It be the best lookin' pirate jacket
I got it from a sewfish
Me jacket be made from a sail
So one be from a sail
and the other be from a sale
there be a HUGE sea monster
with the sharpest teeth me ever did see
unless I paid a one coin toll
and all I be findin is
Suddenly, I be findin a coin
I quickly flipped it to the monster
##ARR! I be proud to be ye friend!
Make sure to claim me background
It be a fine picture of me! YAR HAR!
Me beard keeps me warm on me travels!
It be good for storing things too
and an extra pair o boots!
Yarr be keeping lookout at me ship
Yarr be right here beside me!
Me favorite animal be a puffle!
Pirates! What be ye favorite animal?
I likes pirate music that I can dance a jig to!
What be ye favorite sport mateys?!
Me favorite sport be a snowball fight
Arr what be ye favorite hobby?
Me hobbies be sailin' and treasure huntin'
Find me key to open me quarters!
Me journal be in the Newsroom
##Farewell me hearties! I be leavin' now!
Me hearties! thanks for the fun!
This be time for me to go!##
##These questions remind me of me tales...
Though me tales be true! har har
If a pirate doesn't know an answer...
It's our last party on Club Penguin
So let's make it a good one!
It has a lot to live up to...
There have been many great ones
I'm going to try not to be sad...
I want to celebrate all we've done...
the art and stories and fun you've made
It's been an honor reporting here
I'm lucky to have been a part of it
And you've all worked so hard...
would be very proud of you
Thank you all for your kindness
And the villains will never win...
as long as we have that
Oh my I appear to be tearing up
Dash it all! I'd hoped to not cry
I hope it's not too hard!
I do enjoy a tough question though
Have you looked at the bold words?
Oh, I would love to be your friend
Do you have my background yet?
Do you read the Club Penguin Times?
Do you mind if I interview you?
I have too many favorites to say for sure
My favorite games are Find Four and Mancala
We could have a tea part##
Вы можете прислать мне свои шутки или и вопросы.
Я рада, что вам нравится газета.
Поговорим о любимых воспоминаниях! Кому что понравилось больше всего?
Мне нравятся картинки, которые вы мне присылаете.
Мне нравятся картинки, которые вы мне присылаете.
Мы можем быть друзьями по переписке!
Могу поспорить, среди вас много писателей!
Мы с вами отлично провели время.
В следующем году будет ещё лучше!
Боюсь, я не могу говорить о Герберте
но обещаю, что мы продолжаем следить за ним
Мы находимся в общественном месте, агент
Может, мы обсудим этот вопрос позже?
Я руковожу только одной организацией - газетой "КП"
Боюсь, я не вполне понимаю, о чём ты говоришь
Как я могу быть редактором и директором одновременно?
Знаете, что мне больше всего нравится в этой комнате? Все вы!
Ваши воспоминания очень важны для нашего острова.
И каждый из вас помнит множество историй, приключившихся в Клубе пингвинов!
А какие истории любите читать вы?
can I get a WHAT WHAT?
is there a party going on here?
everybody in the club holla at me!
Let's party like there's no tomorrow!
I wanna let you all know...
No one throws parties like you
It was all y'all that lifted me up
##one of my fave CP memories is
i was trying to find the right jam
yknow like a sound that really spoke to me
and i just couldnt get it
i was hanging with the penguin band
it was such a rad time
it really was the best day ever
and i knew i found it
that was the sound i was looking for!!
i wrote best day ever that night
and i owe it all to my pals
i was so psyched to see him onstage
played gigs on the Ice Berg!
we had a HUGE backstage party
it happened on a luxury cruise ship!!
I think some of you were out there too
Now, those are some stellar beats!
Way to show off ur style!
U really know how to rock
I'll have to get her one too
Let's have a puffle fashion show!
##party penguins in the place to be!
wave ya flippers in the air!
any requests for DJ K Dance?
##you guys want to sing my song?
want me to sing my song?
u guys have ta sing too
I get a lot of distance
I'm the crowned queen of this funky scene
Can I get a what what?
Turn the music loud for an epic win
DJ K Dance in the house!
Come on, get your flippers up
And if you wave 'em hard enough
Til ur chillin like a villain
I got my boom box with me and I'm ready to spin
When the party starts and you're still asking around
когда я скажу "НЕ ТАНЦУЕМ!", вы скажете "НИ ЗА ЧТО!"
как будто вы не знаете, что случилось!
catch ya on the flip side!
Я рад, что вы смогли присоединиться ко мне.
Я достиг жизнерадостности на квантовом уровне.
Это значит, что я очень рад!
We're celebrating all our time on the island
I know that everything works out well!
This has been a fantastic experiment
My work will be focused on other dimensions
I think there's a lot more out there!##
##Would you like to know a favorite memory of mine?
that years ago I owned a sports shop
You see, I'm quite fond of athletics
There are many variables involved in sports
Anyway, my shop was quite successful
until the day of the popcorn explosion
and it went off right in my shop!
I still can't fathom why he'd target my shop
It's not as if there was anything super secret there
Do you know what was built in its place?
there are certainly no secrets there
I once went back in time
and created the world's first pizza
How could I have done this?
With the Time Trekker 3000, of course!
Some of you may have joined me on my trip
It was there that I met Garugg the Ugg Ugg
He's my great great great great
great great great great great great
and after adopting my dino puffle Darwin
I constructed a pizza with Garugg
Surely one of my finest inventions!
Halloween parties are a favorite of mine
It's the perfect time to watch a scary film
Do you know which one is my favorite?
Have you witnessed any of them?##
Я кое-что знаю о секретном обществе пингвинов...
Да, я хорошо знаю медведя Герберта.
Но если говорить серьёзно, то Герберт – большая угроза.
ППП делают всё, что в их силах.
Могу только сказать, что оказываю ППП техническую помощь.
Извините, сейчас я об этом говорить не могу.
Have you attempted this experiment before?
It didn't work. Let's try again
That means I enjoy inventing things
I will draw up some blueprints
Shall we perform a simple exercise in physics?
Now bunch it into your hand...
Now arch your arm back at a comfortable angle
Estimate the weight of the snowball
It went right where I intended
Can you pass me a new beaker?
Can you help me mix this?
Good luck with all your inventions##
Я сочту за честь стать твоим другом.
Для этого откройте мою карточку игрока.
Это означает, что я люблю насекомых.
Жуков, бабочек, мошек и всё такое прочее.
А какое у вас любимое животное?
Я люблю увлекательные партии в шахматы.
Я люблю играть в “Четыре в ряд”.
Хотя, кое-какие мелодии диджея Искорки очень заводные!
Я рад, что на острове такие достойные учёные.
Это значит, что вы идёте прямо к цели.
Он на моих глазах вылупился из яйца.
Пафлы для меня – пока что недостаточно исследованная тема.
Что ж, мне пора. До скорого!
Я определённо вернусь в обозримом будущем.
Не бросайте исследования, пока меня не будет.
Не сомневаюсь, что мы ещё встретимся.
Wow it's so nice to meet you
I just want to thank all our fans
We're so lucky to have had this run
Are you guys in a band?
How did you come up with this?
Cadence when does the party start?
I'll tell them you said hi
I've been working hard on my music
You can pick up our background...
Who's your favorite Music Cruise act?
It's okay if it isn't us...
we like all the other acts!
But I love performing so much##
Alright where do you want to go?
Can someone pass me a water bottle?
Thanks so much for hanging out.##
It is good to see you my students##
to teach and train with you
Ninjas have a long history on this island
No matter what journey awaits you
your ninjas skills will serve you well
I have spent time meditating on the past
But there was a shadow in Tusk's heart
And he grew dark with jealousy
how we were best of friends
Those memories bring serenity to my heart
The young ninjas showed great discipline
The skies filled with fire and water
There is such history in these rooms
I can feel it flow through me...
And the excitement of the current##
..а с острым соусом он ещё вкуснее!
But the wise ninja knows when to rest
We draw our power from nature
##Like the great earthquake, you rock the house!
Let us discuss the ways of the ninja
Where is your favorite place to be invisible?
Hide and Seek is also great fun
It is easy for ninjas to win Hide and Seek
Come face me in the Dojo later
Haha! That joke was very funny!
Turning invisible tires me out. Phew!
Тебе нужно встретиться со мной в школе единоборств.
Я сочту за честь стать твоим другом.
Я люблю смотреть на поединки в ниндзя-карты.
Я много времени провожу в диких землях.
Я до сих пор тренируюсь, совершенствуя навыки.
Моя любимая музыка – спокойный звук флейты.
Ещё я люблю звук барабанов и гонга.
Каждый ученик должен стараться узнать как можно больше!
You just need to write three lines
One thing in life is most true
##Are you continuing to train each day?
There is always more to learn
A ninja must always be ready
The ninja's power rests in the ability to learn
If you train today you will be ready for tomorrow
Your training has only begun, my students
There are other elements to master
There are always more skills to learn
Tell me, how have you been training?
I have been traveling in the wilderness learning more skills
The wilderness has taught me much
Like the giant iceberg it's pretty cool
Tea is like the great ocean
Relaxing to watch, but mighty in strength##
##I am proud to see so many ninjas
You have come a long way in your training!
Together your strength is like the mighty waterfall
Together your strength is like a powerful flame
Together your strength is like an avalanche
Have you been drinking enough tea?
Wisdom lies at the bottom of your teacup
I am proud of the ninjas that you have become##
Well done, I see you have ninja speed
Heh heh! We shall all have to train harder, yes?
Nothing but a hungry ninja of course
Look what the puffle dragged in...
I am Herbert P Bear Esquire
I've been waiting for this FOREVER!
I think I'll take credit for this
I won't miss it at all...
Now how do I get off this island?
I don't want to be here...
when all you penguins get sappy
##What is with all the racket out here?
You penguins have been annoying for ELEVEN years!
I'm gonna have my own party
Do you know which party was my favorite?
This room is my least favorite
I hate any room that has a penguin in it
I could trash this place if I wanted to
And the EPF couldn't stop me!##
If you'll excuse me I must be off...
I don't have time for this
I shall grace you with my knowledge
I shall astound you with my brilliance
My favorite animal is the polar bear
My favorite music is QUIET music
Which you penguins DO NOT HAVE
I also enjoy listening to Bearthooven
The only games I play are MIND games
I also enjoy a game of solitaire
Is taking over the world a sport?
I enjoy seaweed pizza the most
But you had better hold the anchovies
Or else I shall ensure your DOOOOM!
I’m a vegetarian, you daft creature!
Vegetables are superior in taste and texture
My hobbies are building ingenious devices
Plotting to take over the island
You don't know what you're talking about
You might have a point there
Do you understand the magnitude of what I just said?
It was simple. A bit of this, a bit of that.
That was a waste of time
If they were more like crabs I wouldn't mind them
No but seriously I don't do friendship
You are welcome to be my minion
Request to be a minion the same way
You can be on my minion list
Minions! It is time to prove your loyalty
Pledge your support to the cause of...
Look at all of my minions
You're the Agent that's always fowling up my plans!
You're the agents that are always fowling up my plans!
Give up! There's no way you can defeat me!
My snowballs are ten times greater than yours!
Good try, Agent, but better luck next time
that not only am I more intelligent than you
Leave the snarky comments to me, Agent##
Ну всё, жалкие пингвины. Вы меня РАЗОЗЛИЛИ!
Вам не понравится, что вы меня разозлили.
Every genius needs a proper lackey
He's a good one to have around
This one time he tried to make a salad...
Well, I AM a master storyteller
In addition to being a super genius
WHAT ARE YOU A BUNCH OF GHOSTS?!
All of these stories are true!
THIS IS EXACTLY HOW THEY HAPPENED!
You wouldn't know a good story if it sneezed on you!
Once upon a time there was a magnificent polar bear
Who was trying to build a wood chopper
So that everyone could have a nice warm fire
But along came a group of nasty agents
And they didn't want ANYONE to be warm
So they snuck up on the poor polar bear
And they mixed up the wood chopper's controls...
...causing it to sink into a lake!
Once upon a time there was a Clothes Shop
And the Clothes Shop had a vault full of coins
But the vault was very dirty, and difficult to clean
So a friendly polar bear decided to help
He built a HUGE magnet to lift up all the coins
But a group of stinky agents came by
And they wanted everything to be stinky like them
Once upon a time there was a bunch of sad penguins
They were bored because everything was boring
So a friendly polar bear decided to help
He built an enormous underground drill
And he drilled a bunch of super sweet tunnels
But a group of grumpy agents came along
And they didn't want ANYone to have fun
So they broke the polar bear's drill...
...and almost wrecked the island's precious boiler!
Once upon a time, there was a cold island
And on that island was a poor cold polar bear
But the bear was also clever
So he made a thermal reversion laser
And it made one spot on the dreary island
He even let some penguins stay there
just because the bear was warm
So they blew up his laser!
And made the whole island lame
There was a polar bear that drifted
to an island full of mean penguins
He wanted to be warm and safe
So he made a base far away from the penguins
Stole a coin-operated dial for the heater
So he came up with a brilliant plan
He would make the useless furballs
So that he could be warm forever
But agents wanted the puffles back...
so they trespassed on his base...
and broke the mind control devices!
carried the polar bear into the wilds!##
That color looks excellent on you!##
##This party really snuck up on me!
And I thought I was stealthy
I've been undercover for a while
But I wanted to make an appearance...
to say how thankful I am
So many of you supported me...
And many of you helped me...
Wherever your next mission takes you...
##I have so many great memories on the island
One of my favorites is the 2015 Fashion Festival
The island was so glammed up
But just before stepping on the runway
I noticed a mustard stain on my Blue Dazzle Dress
I ran to the pizza parlor for mustard
Then I dripped some onto my dress
You guys are sporting it really well
You really have an eye for it
I made it out of a table cloth
You really know how to match
You really know hot to clash
I might wear cozy yellow knee socks
I'll wear a soft blue hoodie
But it's tough to be sad in a hoodie
I bet I could make a cool outfit out of...
Want to help me come up with new design ideas?
puffle slippers? That would be cute!
a hat with butterfly wings? Like a dream!
Pants with a cat tail on them? Totally silly!
socks that you wear on your arms? Um...
That last one was Rookie's idea
I didn't know he was so interested in fashion!
Fashion is a big deal on Club Penguin
We all like to dress up
It's how we show who we are
I think you're all very creative
You make amazing outfits all the time
inspired me to try making clothes
I think I still have a lot to learn...
Do you have any fashion tips?##
Я предложила сшить ему новый лабораторный халат...
но он сказал, что не обращает внимания на такие мелочи.
Я бы хотела стать такой, как она.
Не думаю, что она хотела бы его сменить.
Вы только взгляните на его камзол!
Только он может носить такую рубашку!
А шапочка с пропеллером ему очень идет.
и я еле за ней поспевала.
П. В. всегда выглядит очень уютно...
Он чем-то похож на свой костюм.
но не думаю, что ему это понравится.
Ее стиль забавный и очень милый.
##EPF? I don't know much about that
We'll talk back at headquarters, agent
We are secret agents after all
I don't have intel on that
I create disguises for the EPF
I think the Klutzy disguise is my best...
though I'd make it shinier if I could...
it doesn't quite match Klutzy's shell
Stealth is a key skill for agents...
It lets us observe without being seen
I'm glad my disguises have helped
we need to watch him carefully
I wonder if he'd be less grumpy...
if he had a good outfit
Но я всё равно остаюсь агентом Точкой.
Я в любом случае делаю одежду...
Никогда не думала, что смогу стать дизайнером...
Ну конечно я стану твоим другом!
но я с ними часто работаю.
Thanks for talking fashion with me!
Throw a snowball at the answer!
We're waddling all over this island
Nah I probably just forgot it was here
But I'm sure it's all awesome!
I've learned a lot from you guys!##
My favorite animal is my pet rock
My favorite animal is my rubber duck!
I like elevator music the best
My favorite game is a staring contest
I really like the game I Spy
My hobbies are cooking fish and extreme ironing
I have a large collection of fish recipes.
I like things better when they're extreme!
I think you might be wrong
I should ask Gary about that
The EPF are the good guys
I can't tell you I'm an agent
I spy with my little eye...
Что полярный медведь сказал о снежном домике?
Вот видите! Я ЗНАЛ, что она смешная!
А вот Герберт был другого мнения
Я ещё могу рассказать шутку из серии "тук-тук"
Ой, постойте! Это же была шутка!
I just think clowns are kinda scary...
Why are their shoes so big?
No one has any business having shoes that big
That's a scary wig you have
That's a nice wig you have
Still pretty spooky if you ask me##
What's the biggest thing you could eat?
I bet I could eat more!
Вы делаете то, что я говорю
Если я не скажу слов "Новичков сказал"...
Потому что я попытаюсь вас запутать
Наверное, тогда я выхожу из игры!
Всё то же самое, только теперь ты говоришь, что нам делать!
Think you can beat me, mate?
I'll never stop my search for puffles
I still don't think we've found 'em all!
Best of luck on your expeditions
I've loved meeting all your puffles
##Maybe you'd like ta hear some of my good memories?
There was a time I worked for a special organization
Crikey, it was a great job
I helped train puffles for this organization
I guess you could say they were elite puffles
I really loved designing the puffle hotel
It's a great place to bring your puffle mates
But do you know why we built it so tall?
Well, we wanted to reach the clouds
So we could visit the rainbow puffles
Crikey, they're such a magical puffle!
Though they are a wee gassy
I can never forget the wilderness expedition
It was a dangerous trek through back country
I wasn't sure I'd make it back to town
Right as I'm certain I'm lost
I feel something at my feet
I look down and there it is...
He was so smart that he led me home!##
Какую еду мы с собой возьмём?
Если хотите повстречаться с дикими пафлами,
Aunt Arctic seemed to have a lot
Even Rookie had some mysterious items
Here's a treat for your puffle
##Have ya taught your pet any tricks?

Мы нашли его во время экспедиции.
Этот пафл очень привязан к хозяину.
У диджея Искорки есть такой пафл по имени Хихи!
Этот пафл меньше, чем все остальные.
Рокхоппер говорит, что это он его нашёл.
Этот пафл родом из Коробочного измерения.
А ещё он мастерски играет в прятки!
У Гарри есть такой синий пафл.
На голове у них по три рога.
Но у них нет никакой крыши!
но на самом деле — очень милые.
и всё подряд пробуют на вкус.
Он появился у нас на острове на Хэллоуин.
У него нет цвета, потому что он прозрачный.
У меня есть много историй про пафлов!
Пингвины и пафлы, подходите поближе и послушайте!
Я расскажу вам, как я нашла коричневых пафлов!
В одном из своих путешествий по диким землям
я наткнулась на какое-то странное устройство.
Я начала нажимать на нём разные кнопки,
Оно перенесло меня на затерянный берег,
На ней я поплыла на неизведанный остров,
в которой была КУЧА коричневых пафлов!
Подумать только — открыть новый вид пафлов!
Я расскажу вам, как я нашла радужных пафлов!
Поглядев на него в подзорную трубу,
Так что я отправилась в Облачный лес
И там я познакомилась с радужными пафлами.
Но в следующий раз я использую пушку.
и совсем скоро из него вырос
Как-то раз я шла по лесу
Шум становился все громче и громче.
Оказалось, что это мой пафл Пит
Так что остаток дня мы вместе
На прошлой неделе я учила его
приносить мячик. Я кинула ему мяч,
что мяч он отдал нашему соседу,
а сам сожрал все его носки!
Я горжусь тем, как дрессирую своих пафлов,
но с ним у меня ничего не выходит.
Что бы я ни просила, он делает всё наоборот!
Может, поэтому мы с ним так хорошо ладим.
